reference: 1. Karl Brunner and Allan H. Meltzer. Money, Debt and Economic Activity. Journal of Political Economy, LXXX (September/October, 1972).

6. Benjamin M. Friedman. Survey Evidence on the `Rationality of Interest Rate Expectations. Journal of Monetary Economics, forthcoming.

11. Friedrich A. Lutz. The Structure of interest Rates. Quarterly Journal of Economics, LIV (November, 1940).
